title: Request Showing Feedback
description: An agent showed a listing yesterday. The listing agent needs to request feedback from them.

tasks.description: Identify all agents who showed the property in the last 24 hours from the showing service log.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the contact information for the agent who showed the property.

tasks.description: Send a standardized email or text message to the showing agent asking for their and their client's feedback on the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a polite request for feedback.

tasks.description: Receive the feedback and log it in the listing's communication file for the seller to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives feedback (e.g., 'client liked the layout but thought the price was high') and logs it.
